transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello? Yes.
Customer: Hanji sir good morning Preeti Rathore baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART head office se.
Executive: Yes, good morning.
Customer: Hanji sir kaise ho aap?
Executive: Badhiya hu.
Customer: Achcha, main ye bol rahi thi sir ki maine kuch product mein aapke corrections to karwaye the takriban che saat product pe correction jo hai us din karwaye the aapke usko bol kar ke Ranjit ko.
Customer: Dusra abhi usko maine bola tha wo jo category jo usne bheji hai wo pallets wali right?
Customer: To agar ye pallets aapne bola ki brother deal karte hain to inke product add karne hain ya nahi karne hain kyunki bina product add ke matlab uska direct inquiry or call receive ka jo wo hai objective wo fulfill nahi hoga sir.
Customer: So we need to aap consume kar sakte ho but if you are looking for some sort of direct inquiries and calls to wo usme nahi aayegi aur ek cheez usme aur hai ki that will create more confusion kyunki pallets agar aap consume kar rahe hain to existing form mein na since AI is working.
Customer: To aapke paas mein pallets ki requirement bahut jyada dikhne lagegi somewhere wo jo requirements hai aapki jo actual products hai wo beech mein kahin na kahin na mix hoti hai hide hoti hai.
Customer: To isme mujhe thoda sa aapke clarity chahiye hogi sir.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Haan. Theek hai safety lockers to number one pe rakhna hai locker products ko aur pallets ko number two pe rakhna hai.
Customer: Nahi nahi wo safety lockers wala to mujhe us din kya hai na clarity mujhse aa gayi na usme koi problem nahi hai wo to aapko kar ke maine bataya tha ki wo we can get it done I am having ID ki kis tarike se usko kara ke lena hai but my point is ki aapka jaise security safe wala product line hai right your product line is this and aap wo consume kar rahe hain to other segments jo hai they are getting mixed in one profile only.
Customer: To AI kya hua hai
Customer: [unintelligible]
Customer: To aap plastic pallets ki lead kharid rahe hain industrial pallets ki lead kharid rahe hain to aapko recommendation mein wahi lead jo hai jyadatar show karne lagta hai jisme kahin na kahin product wo
Executive: Awaaz nahi aa rahi hai.
Executive: Awaaz nahi aa rahi hai aapki beech mein.
Customer: Theek hai.
Customer: Abhi aa rahi hai sir?
Executive: Hmm abhi thoda thoda pichla five minutes kuch suna nahi maine.
Customer: Achcha to main aapko ye bol rahi thi ki aapka jo product hai
Executive: Mobile madam ye mere khayal se landline hai kya ye aawaz bilkul bhi nahi aa rahi hai.
Customer: Sir landline nahi hai matlab number to mera direct hi hai beech mein bas IVR ki call lagi hui hai sir.
Executive: Okay isliye wo beech beech mein aawaz bilkul blank ho jata hai aur wo reverberate karta hai.
Customer: Aap ek minute rukhiyega ek minute.
Customer: Abhi aa rahi hai aawaz aapko?
Executive: Hmm theek hai. Haan to main aapko ye bol rahi thi ki aapka jo product line hai safety lockers wala jo product line hai aur hum usme na pallets ki bhi lead utha rahe hain to kya hota hai ki jaise pura system jo hai wo AI based technology chalti hai to system capture ki aap pallets ki bhi lead utha rahe hain to kahin na kahin wo pallets ke usme na wo jo safety lockers wali actual lead hai na wo kahin na kahin unko utni privilege nahi mil payegi kyunki wo aapko relevant wale sections mein na pallet ki bhi lead de raha hoga to kahin na kahin wo aapki actual lead jo hai wo aage piche segment mein miss hoti hai to main aapse yahi clear karna chah rahi thi ki either hume isko rakhna hai ya add karna hai wo kya hai aap clarity mujhe de dijiye sir ek bar.
Executive: Haan rakhna hai na wo add kiya hua hai waha pe plastic pallet actually wo mera bhai karta hai Noida se to wo apni marketing ke liye jo hai so wo usne us product ko add kiye hue hain.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To abhi jaise aapne bataya tha ki mera dusra industry leader wala jo keyword hai to wo keyword aapne hataya man lo to hataya to plastic pallet ko de do wo dusra keyword wo dusra keyword kisko dene wale ho aap?
Executive: Do keyword ka paisa liya hai na.
Customer: Achcha wo to uski jagah to maine wo dono aapke chal rahe hain matlab aisa nahi hai ki hataya hai wo hatane ki jagah maine dusra aapka lagaya bhi hai matlab usko replace kiya hai hataya nahi hai maine chal rahe hain aapke do star to wo dono maine matlab jo locker wale the na hamare safety locker wale hain usme dono aapke star chal rahe hain replace kiya hai hataya nahi hai.
Customer: To waha pe dono chal raha hai mera kehne ka matlab sirf itna hai ki agar pallets hum log deal kar rahe hain to ya to main usme product add karu but usme na kahin na kahin safety lockers ki jo smooth relevant wale section mein aapko leads dikhti hai wo kahin na kahin upar niche hogi kyunki system capture kar raha hai ki aapka pallets mein bhi utna hi transaction ho raha hai matlab utni hi lead aapki consume ho rahi hai to pallets ki bhi lead aapko equally waha pe dikh rahi hongi.
Executive: Hmm pallets ki lead dikhni chahiye na achchi leads dikhni chahiye aap jab dala hai to usko kuch benefit to milna chahiye.
Customer: To main usko add kara ke de deti hu aapko fir wo sare matlab aise keyword add kara ke de de rahi hu inquiries or calls taki aapke paas mein pahunchte rahe.
Executive: Hmm add kar ke de do wo apna dekhta rahega udhar Noida mein.
Customer: Achcha theek hai main ek bar de deti hu aur baki ka kuch rahega to aapko update kar dungi kyunki mujhe khali corrections kara ke dene hain aapko to wo correction ka ek timeline main aapko share karungi kyunki is wale concern mein to abhi mere paas mein kuch aisa pending nahi hai khali catalog improvement ka hi kam mere ko kara kar ke dena hai sir.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai fir ji aapne shayad ek post aur dala tha abhi aage to wo mere paas mein fir escalate ho kar ke aa gaya to they are asking me to get the thing correcting corrected which I am already doing matlab main kar rahi hu wo kam aapka.
Executive: Haan ye revolution shuru ho gaya hai main bahut dino se chah raha tha ki aisa kaise ho sakta hai ki koi aadmi itna mehnat kar ke dusron ko paisa de kar ke usko inquiry order nahi milti hai aur humse bahut jyada padhe likhe ya jo man lo Newton third law maine padha to Newton fourth law to nahi padh liya IndiaMART ke owner ne cheez to wahi padha hoga theek hai unka luck achcha hai aur unki kabiliyat bhi to achchi hai wo wo kehte kya matlab is tarike se kar rahe hain abhi twitter pe abhi dheere dheere aa raha tha abhi bahut log likh rahe hain twitter pe bahut to main bhi ab twitter pe thoda sa active ho raha hu main twitter use nahi karta tha jyada lekin abhi thoda sa main dekh raha hu.
Customer: Sir twitter theek hai lekin wo multiple time agar hoga aur unko agar ye lagega bhi matlab aage ye ja raha hai bar bar ki agar solve nahi ho pa raha to fir waha pe unka bhi decision aa jayega ki theek hai fir agar nahi solve ho pa raha hai matlab after doing the corrections in everything if the things are not getting resolved then wo bhi bol denge ki star ka theek hai service pe aage aap mat chalao agar nahi customer ko resolution de pa rahe ho to wo fir band karne ke liye matlab mere paas mein instruction bhi aa sakta hai to isliye maine bola ki no problem ye to maine aapko us din hi bola tha ki do lakh dene ke baad mujhe agar 20 lakh ka bhi order nahi mil raha hai to ek baat mujhe aap bataiye na ki agar hum correction nahi kar rahe hain ya fir coordination nahi kar rahe hain ya fir acknowledgement nahi kar rahe hain sab kuch hota to aap mujhe matlab bol rahe hain ki abhi main seekh raha hu to main escalate karunga hi karunga to agar wo escalate tab hota hai jab mera concern suna nahi ja raha hai matlab mere ko aage acknowledgement nahi mil raha hai aaj kal har jagah itna ho gaya hai agar main amazon pe mera concern hai to mere ko do din khud matha marna pada hai ki usse pehle AI AI itna khud voice note chalte rehte hain ki wo dhoondh tak reach out karne ke liye jo actual banda hai waha tak reach out karne ke liye mujhe do din lag gaye yaha pe aapko kam se kam ye hai sir ki aapne kuch dala aapke paas mein immediate real call aa rahi hai matlab aisa nahi hai ki beech mein AI hai aur aapko idhar press karna hai udhar press karna hai idhar bhagna hai udhar bhagna hai to I am here maine aapko group bhi banwaya to utna support main kar ke de rahi hu aapko theek hai aur rahi baat aap de rahi ho isse pehle bhi bahut logon ne kar ke diya tha na aisa nahi hai ki someone is matlab kya bolte hain ki wo maniac hai ki ha he is hard pressed for writing such comments on this this this aisa nahi hai madam abhi aap aapke table pe connection kar ke de rahi hu main aapko bata rahi hu main aapko correction kar ke de rahi hu sir main table ke is side hu par main is is side mein abhi nayi nayi aayi hu sir main 10 saal se dekh rahi hu yaha pe customers hi handle kar rahi hu to aapke corrections main kar ke de rahi hu if you are seeing improvement jaise agar maine aaj aapki direct inquiry nikali aapke paas mein direct inquiry mujhe gladiator ki dikh rahi hai to dikh rahi hai to matlab main kuch to kam kar rahi hongi sir tabhi mere paas mein direct inquiry gladiator ki 9 tarikh ko generate hui thi yani ki kal ki date mein Gopalganj se aayi hui hai to utna mere ko dikh raha hai ki ha there is a change in aapki direct inquiry wale usme aapke paas mein ek kam karo aap ye ye ye aapne inquiry kar liya ye 20% kam aapne kar liya ek bar zara Gopalganj wale ko phone kar ke bolo ki ye jo product aapne dekha hai IndiaMART pe isme aapko kya achcha laga aur kya aisa isme tha jisme se aapne isko dekh liya inquiry nahi hai matlab usko dekh liya to in IndiaMART pe to ek bar kisi page ko open bhi kar diya to aap log usko inquiry me convert kar dete hain aapne mujhe bola tha na ki mam mere paas mein aane chahiye matlab wo dekho ab koi buyer mana karega ya deny karega wo sab as in ka wo nahi hai ki usne mana kar diya ya fir main kaise ye nahi chalega aap 10 saal se kam kar rahi hai customer dekh rahi hai to to ye ye main yaha pe kya achar nahi dal raha hu hum log yaha pe aap bahut achcha kam kar rahi hai to baki jo hai to duniya bewkuf hai aisa nahi hai main aapko aur aapke bhale ke liye bol raha hu aap jo bhi samajh rahi hai usko thoda sa aur verify karo go to the next step and take the pains to call that customer lead verify karna mere hath me nahi hota lead verify kyunki ye jo buyer aa raha hai aapke catalog pe aa raha hai sir kyun kyun aaya hai wo wo 21000 dekha hai 20000 21000 dekh lega to aa jayega aapke paas me ye to maine aapko bola tha ki traffic generation ki hai conversion ka mere hath me nahi hai sir aur quantitative analysis bahut important hai aapko jo dikhta hai ki maine man lo pehle kuch nahi tha aapne kya kiya maine bhi price us din kam kar diya ki chalo theek hai ab 21000 dal diya to ho sakta hai ki do char log jo hai so india me dekh lete hain ki chalo ye 21000 hai ab usko click kar diya usne mujhe call nahi kiya usne mujhe kuch side inquiry bheji nahi bheji pata nahi india mart ne click kiya hoga to wo aa gaya hoga dikh gaya aur aap khush hoti hai khub sare laddu kha leti hain aap log ki hum logon ne itna inquiry generate kar diya marketing kar diya wo kar diya are baba kyun dusron ko bewkuf banate rehte ho sir main aapko ek baat koi bhi platform hai sir koi bhi platform hai it is more about matchmaking conversion ki guarantee koi platform aur ye nahi hai sir kisi bhi platform pe aisa hi rehta hai conversion ki guarantee koi nahi de sakta aap apna kam kijiye koi baat nahi hai it's now very pretty clear ki aap apna kam karenge aur mujhe apna kam karna hai theek hai chaliye theek hai sir chaliye okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Pallets lead mixing with safety locker leads.

- Wants clarity on adding/removing pallets product.

- Wants to know about industry leader keyword.



Resolution:

- Executive will add pallets keyword.

- Clarified that industry leader keyword is replaced.

- Executive will share correction timeline.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, product, correction, keywords
